eu_initiatives: Potential discriminatory treatment of volunteers as covered by Article 18 TFEU which prohibits discrimination of EU citizens based on nationality.
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
relevant_communication:
We are in contact with the members of EU Commissioner Bienkowska’s cabinet.  Mr McCusker met with the cabinet on 10th February 2016. 
Commissioner Bienkowska is the Commissioner for the Internal Market, Industry, Entrepreneurship and SME’s. 
We are now arguing that the treatment of our Ski Club Leader volunteers under Article L212-1 of the French Code du Sport is unfair.
goals__remit:
The Ski Club of Great Britain was formed in 1903 with a vision and commitment which is still at the heart of the club. 
Ski Club’s Purpose 
To promote and protect safe, enjoyable and inspiring snowsports experiences. 
Vision 
A lifetime of great experiences for anyone who loves snow. 
 
Mission 2014-2017 
To become more relevant to more snowports enthusiasts in order to become more representative and influential. 
 
Values  
•    Inclusivity 
•    Integrity 
•    Inspiration 
•    Responsibility 
 
Commitments  
•    Membership – Growth 
•    Participation – growth and engagement 
•    Development 
•    Independence 
 
The club has a membership of over 29.000 snowsports enthusiasts and strives to provide them with great benefits as well as play a key role in the UK snowsports industry.
